Directions: In a bowl, combine biscuit mix, milk, butter, garlic powder and Italian seasoning. Stir in pepperoni and cheese just until combined.  Drop by heaping tablespoonfuls 2 in. apart onto ungreased baking sheets. Bake at 400 degrees F for 16-18 minutes or until golden brown. Serve warm.
Ingredients: 2 (3.25 ounce) packages sliced pepperoni, finely chopped
